page.title: 04THE STRODE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The {Strode Sports Centre}was opened in 1984 in the {Wast End of Clevedon. 100 people come to the centre on an average day.The sports hall is used the most. 12 people work there and some part-time. Mostly it is adults who use the centre. About 90 to 100 people go to the body shop per week to do weight lifting. A{swimming pool}is going to be built which wil include a learner pool and you can have lessons. We asked some people what they thought of the sports centre. One lady said she would not recommend the sports centre to anyone because there was not enough equipment,but the rest said they would,that it was a great idea and the swimming pool too.
